# GroupSession.State.joined

**Case**

An active state that indicates the session allows data synchronization between devices.

## Declaration

```swift
case joined
```

## Discussion

Call the [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSession/join()] method to begin the transition to this state. When the transition completes, use the session object to synchronize your app’s data with the other participants’ devices.

## Session states

- **GroupSession.State.waiting**: An idle state that indicates the session is waiting for the app to join the activity.
- **GroupSession.State.invalidated(reason:)**: A state that indicates the session is no longer valid and can’t be used for shared activities.
